I am a Lecturer in Human Geography at the School of Geography, Earth and Environmental Sciences, part of the University of Birmingham (UK).

I am also part of the development team of the open source library PySAL for spatial analysis in Python.

My main research interests are:

  • Urban Economics and Regional Science
  • Spatial Analysis and Spatial Econometrics
  • Open source scientific computing

Feel free to contact me by email.
